name: rollo-monorepo
description: Rollo monorepo containing multiple applications and shared packages

scripts.build:vm-service: cd apps/vm-service && echo 'VM service build complete'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:rollo-site && npm run install:sso && npm run install:vm-service
scripts.install:vm-service: cd apps/vm-service && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:all: npm run build:rollo-site && npm run build:sso && npm run build:vm-service
scripts.test:all: npm run test:rollo-site && npm run test:sso && npm run test:vm-service
